content: crochet an adorable heirloom baby blanket for your little one that will be cherished for years to come with it s simple stitch design and calming stripes it s sure to become a favorite details - pattern is written in standard us terms - basic knowledge of beginner stitches is needed to make this pattern - size of baby blanket is 30 inches x 30 inches - guided stitch tutorial is provided for the pattern materials needed - 2 balls of hobby lobby s yarn bee bamboo-tiful in the color white weight 3 /4 oz 257 yards a total of 514 yards or another lightweight category 3 yarn - 2 balls of hobby lobby s yarn bee bamboo-tiful in the color linen weight 3 /4 oz 257 yards a total of 514 yards or another lightweight category 3 yarn - 1 ball of hobby lobby s cotton dk yarn in the color white weight 3 / 3 5 oz 235 yards a total of 235 yards or another woven/bubbled lightweight category 3 yarn - 4 0 mm f crochet hook - darning needle - scissors
